upcoming.title: Introduction to Azure Cloud Computing
upcoming.description: Learn the fundamentals of Microsoft Azure, including cloud services, virtual machines, and storage solutions. Perfect for beginners looking to start their cloud journey.

upcoming.title: Power Platform Workshop
upcoming.description: Hands-on workshop covering Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI. Build your first low-code applications and automate business processes.

upcoming.title: Student Developer Conference 2025
upcoming.description: Annual student developer conference featuring industry experts, technical sessions, and networking opportunities. Join us for a full day of learning and innovation.

past.title: Introduction to GitHub and Open Source
past.description: Workshop on version control with Git and GitHub, contributing to open source projects, and best practices for collaborative development.

past.title: AI and Machine Learning Fundamentals
past.description: Introduction to artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts using Microsoft's AI services and Azure ML Studio.

past.title: Web Development with .NET Core
past.description: Hands-on session on building modern web applications using ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, and deploying to Azure.

past.title: MLSC Orientation & Welcome Event
past.description: Welcome event for new members introducing them to the Microsoft Learn Student Community, its objectives, and upcoming activities.
